snippet: LEAD: A few weeks back, we tossed off an informal classification of top California wines based - as was the famous 1855 Bordeaux classification -mostly on track record. The wineries that made the cut: Beaulieu, Beringer, Caymus, Clos du Val, Chalo...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: A few weeks back, we tossed off an informal classification of top California wines based - as was the famous 1855 Bordeaux classification -mostly on track record. The wineries that made the cut: Beaulieu, Beringer, Caymus, Clos du Val, Chalone, Diamond Creek, Grgich Hills, Heitz, Inglenook, Mayacamas, Stag's Leap, Robert Mondavi and
